医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
加州理工学院开发用于精确药物输送的微型机器人未来，将治疗药物准确地输送到体内需要的地方可能是微型机器人的任务。不少金属人形机器人，甚至是仿生机器人；思考而不是微小的气泡状球体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Caltech-develops-microrobots-for-precise-drug-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Caltech-develops-microrobots-for-precise-drug-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9caf1ad-5eb3-480f-81e1-a237ff5e9f71 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 20:31:00 -0500 Caltech develops microrobots for precise drug delivery
血压波动与思维和记忆能力问题有关根据美国神经病学学会医学杂志《神经病学》在线期刊 2024 年 12 月 11 日发表的一项研究，血压随时间波动的老年人可能更容易出现思维和记忆能力问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Blood-Pressure-fluctuations-linked-to-problems-with-thinking-and-memory-skills.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Blood-Pressure-fluctuations-linked-to-problems-with-thinking-and-memory-skills.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6fedb3b8-050a-4e84-8d37-ea14ee310b56 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 20:04:22 -0500 Blood pressure fluctuations linked to problems with thinking and memory skills
针对炎症性皮肤病的新疗法可能即将出现根据匹兹堡大学今天在《科学转化医学》上发表的一项研究，一种治疗红斑痤疮和其他炎症性皮肤病的新方法可能即将出现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Novel-treatment-for-lingual-skin-conditions-could-be-on-the-horizo​​n.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Novel-treatment-for-lingual-skin-conditions-could-be-on-the-horizo​​n.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb3bffcd-8845-48a1-92a8-31a70f07643f Wed, 11 Dec 2024 19:54:50 -0500 Novel treatment for inflammatory skin conditions could be on the horizon
下一代细胞穿透抗体可以改变癌症治疗Rackear 等人的研究论文“用于肿瘤靶向和 RAD51 抑制的下一代细胞穿透抗体”的新闻专题。于 2024 年 11 月 22 日发表在 Oncotarget 第 15 卷上，标题为“细胞穿透单克隆抗体治疗的进展”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Next- Generation-cell-penetrating-antibodies-could-transform-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Next- Generation-cell-penetrating-antibodies-could-transform-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bacb7cc2-70a6-4154-b95b-af6cefd69ef3 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 19:36:58 -0500 Next-generation cell-penetrating antibodies could transform cancer treatment
研究为更安全、非成瘾性疼痛管理提供了一条潜在途径新加坡国立大学 (NUS) 的研究人员与中国北京大学合作，发现了 TRPV1（瞬时受体电位香草酸 1）离子通道及其在疼痛感知中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Study-offers-a-pottial-pathway-for-safer-non-addictive-pain-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Study-offers-a-pottial-pathway-for-safer-non-addictive-pain-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43b33795-dec3-4a9f-ad03-6e1fa729aae4 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 19:32:35 -0500 Study offers a potential pathway for safer, non-addictive pain management
了解血管生成如何导致乳腺癌耐药性乳腺癌是女性中最常见的癌症，因其对多种治疗产生耐药性而臭名昭著，包括手术、化疗、靶向治疗和免疫治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Understanding-how-angiogenesis-contributes-to-drug-resistance-in-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Understanding-how-angiogenesis-contributes-to-drug-resistance-in-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47a8092b-99b7-4bb8-9337-d84c176ebdf5 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 19:28:02 -0500 Understanding how angiogenesis contributes to drug resistance in breast cancer
突破性研究为先兆子痫孕妇带来希望宾夕法尼亚大学工程师取得了一项重大突破，弥补了先兆子痫孕妇的重大健康公平差距，先兆子痫是由于胎盘血流不足而引起的疾病，导致孕妇血压升高和流向胎儿的血流受限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Groundwriting-research-offers-hope-for-pregnant-people-with-pre-eclampsia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Groundwriting-research-offers-hope-for-pregnant-people-with-pre-eclampsia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=311921de-559e-4eb7-89b2-1191750b0d3e Wed, 11 Dec 2024 19:24:18 -0500 Groundbreaking research offers hope for pregnant people with pre-eclampsia
新型抗病毒药物有望对抗多种病毒Paxlovid 于 2021 年 12 月的到来标志着 COVID-19 大流行的另一个转折点——一种有效的抗病毒药物，此后已成功治疗了数百万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/New-class-of-antivirals-shows-promise-against-multiple-viruses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/New-class-of-antivirals-shows-promise-against-multiple-viruses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc950ea4-f0d0-41db-97a1-41138ffe085b Wed, 11 Dec 2024 19:13:11 -0500 New class of antivirals shows promise against multiple viruses
研究强调全球早发性结直肠癌激增美国癌症协会 (ACS) 研究人员领导的一项新研究显示，全球 50 个国家/地区中有 27 个国家/地区的早发性结直肠癌 (CRC) 发病率正在上升，其中 20 个国家/地区的早发性结直肠癌发病率单独上升或上升更快。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Study-highlights-global-surge-in-early-onset-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Study-highlights-global-surge-in-early-onset-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a3adcca-97aa-4074-803e-8b43075c9561 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 19:08:20 -0500 Study highlights global surge in early-onset colorectal cancer
印度空气污染导致数百万人死亡卡罗林斯卡学院的一项新研究表明，长期暴露在空气污染中导致印度数百万人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Air-pollution-kills-millions-in-India.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Air-pollution-kills-millions-in-India.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3c134f4-a2ea-4d04-af76-0b614dc1f87e Wed, 11 Dec 2024 19:01:36 -0500 Air pollution kills millions in India
